meanings.sent1: The venulous leaf was green and covered in tiny veins.
meanings.sent2: Her arms looked venulous, with the blue veins clearly visible under the skin.
meanings.sent3: The venulous map of the city showed all the main roads as thick veins.
meanings.sent4: The venulous patterns on the marble floor resembled a complex network of veins.
meanings.sent5: The venulous spider web glistened in the morning dew, looking like a delicate network of veins.

meanings.sent1: The bodybuilder's venulous arms bulged with prominent veins.
meanings.sent2: The venulous veins on his neck stood out, showing his excitement.
meanings.sent3: The venulous tree bark had such prominent veins that it looked like a natural sculpture.
meanings.sent4: Her venulous hands were so detailed, they seemed to tell a story through the prominent veins.
meanings.sent5: The venulous wings of the butterfly had such prominent veins that they shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The venulous pattern on the fabric looked like a network of veins.
meanings.sent2: The venulous design on the vase resembled the intricate patterns of veins.
meanings.sent3: The venulous cracks on the old painting gave it a unique, vein-like appearance.
meanings.sent4: Her venulous hair cascaded down her back, resembling the flow of veins.
meanings.sent5: The venulous road map of the country had intricate lines that mimicked the branching of veins.
